Highlights & Device Specific Changes:
Build type: Monthly
Device: Redmi Note 7 Pro (violet)
Device maintainer: Mohiuddin Ahmed
======2nd November, 2024=====
- Intial Unofficial Build
- Added Xiaomi Doly
- Update gps blobs to LA.UM.9.15.2.r1-10100-KAMORTA.QSSI14.0
- Speed profile services and wifi-service to reduce RAM and storage
- Increase ZRAM to 3GB
